alert.note: Alert for Burke; Columbia; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 3:27PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Columbia, northwestern Burke and central Richmond Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 327 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Gordon, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Gordon, Martinez, Hephzibah, Augusta Mall, Daniel Field, South Augusta, Augusta Regional Airport, Village Plaza Shopping Center, Blythe, Forest Hills, Minnick Park, Hillcrest Memorial Park, Glenn Hills, Bath-Edie, Pea Patch Aerodrome, Westover, Miles Park, Richmond County Recreation Center, Ellwood, and Diamond Lakes Regional Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 195 and 197. Interstate 520 in Georgia between mile markers 1 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
